definition: large pelagic shark of warm seas with a whiplike tail used to round up small fish on which to feed
details:
noun
- large pelagic shark of warm seas with a whiplike tail used to round up small fish on which to feed
= synonyms: thresher
- thrush-like American songbird able to mimic other birdsongs
= synonyms: mocking thrush
- a farm machine for separating seeds or grain from the husks and straw
= synonyms: thresher
